channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023101353
item.description:
Report X-2023101353

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: AM QA discovered package leaking in unload. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: This package was leaking from the top of the box and one of the sides of the box. 4 fl. oz. of the content spilled on the box due to a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.
